SEARCH
Package Server.Web.Lobby

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
Server.Web.Lobby.Lobby
All Implemented Interfaces:
Traslator
public class Lobby extends Object implements Traslator
The type Lobby. This class controls the lobby of the server, it manages the relations between the clients and the rooms

  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby(int portSocket, int portRMI)
      Instantiates a new Lobby.
      Parameters:
      portSocket - the port for socket connections
      portRMI - the port for rmi connections

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start() throws MsgNotDeliveredException, StartConnectionFailedException
      Dequeues messages from the toDoQueue
      Throws:
      MsgNotDeliveredException - when the message couldn't be delivered
      StartConnectionFailedException - when the connection with client couldn't be started

    • addConnection

      public void addConnection(String name, ClientHandlerInterface handlerInterface)
      Memorizes a new couple (nickname, personal handler) to effectively use the new connection if the name is already taken it is investigated if the player has disconnected somehow, if the name is empty or the result of the investigation is that the existing player is active an error message is sent to the client
      Parameters:
      name - the player
      handlerInterface - the handler of the player

    • enterRoom

      public void enterRoom(String playerName, String roomName, int expectedPlayers)
      Inserts the player in the requested room, if the room doesn't exist creates a new room and inserts the player there
      Parameters:
      playerName - the player nickname
      roomName - the name of the room
      expectedPlayers - the number of expected players, it is null if the room already exists

    • getGameNames

      public ArrayList<String> getGameNames()
      Get game names array list.
      Returns:
      returns the names of the available rooms doesn't return the rooms which are already full

    • getPlayerName

      public String getPlayerName(ClientHandlerInterface handlerInterface)
      Given the handler returns the nickname of the associated player
      Parameters:
      handlerInterface - the personal handler
      Returns:
      the nickname of the player

    • enqueueMessage

      public void enqueueMessage(MessageToLobby msg)
      Adds a message to the queue of incoming messages
      Parameters:
      msg - the incoming message to be added

    • sendToPlayer

      public void sendToPlayer(String playerName, MessageFromServer msg) throws MsgNotDeliveredException
      Sends a message to a player
      Parameters:
      playerName - the recipient nickname
      msg - the message to be delivered
      Throws:
      MsgNotDeliveredException - if the message couldn't be delivered

    • newRMI_Connection

      public void newRMI_Connection(ServerHandlerInterface handlerInterface)
      Method to instantiate a new RMI connection with a client
      Parameters:
      handlerInterface - the client remote interface to communicate with

    • closeRoom

      public void closeRoom(String roomName)
      Close room.
      Parameters:
      roomName - the room name

    • quitGameBeforeStart

      public void quitGameBeforeStart(String roomName, String player)
      Quit game before start.
      Parameters:
      roomName - the room name
      player - the player

    • reconnectPlayer

      public void reconnectPlayer(String playerID, ClientHandlerInterface handler)
      Reconnect player.
      Parameters:
      playerID - the player id
      handler - the handler

    • updateHeartBeat

      public void updateHeartBeat(String playerId)
      On the arrival of a heart beat, updates the timestamp at which the player was seen.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the player id
